title: Still more trouble

embed.description: Okay so, I made a smurf account so that I can jump into the roleplaying boards and such...and I cant do anything. When I opened them up, it keeps telling me to log in(which I already am, clearly) and when I click on that it just refreshes the page.

body: So, I'm still having issues with this. Can't even respond to a comment. I had to fight with the computer just to be able to create a discussion cuz it kept telling me I'm not logged in. My summoner name is Sona Silence, I have no clue what is happening here at all :/

replies.body:
If you cannot reply, it means the account you've signed in with does not have a summoner name. 

You can check this by logging into the game client with this account and verify you have a summoner name (or create one). I hope this helped!
